contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Available at a radically low price, this alpaca turtleneck is made to be loved. Soft and luxurious, the flecked yarn and plush feel make it ideal for harsher weather. It's long lasting and resistant to pilling.
contentfulProduct.title: Baby Alpaca-Wool Turtleneck

content.value: Buy any 3 cashmere, silk, linen, supersoft, activewear, socks, jackets, alpaca sweater or ponte pant items save $5, buy any 4 and save $10

Chunky and comfortable at its core, this alpaca turtleneck sweater is made to be loved. Soft and luxurious, the flecked yarn and plush feel make it ideal for harsher weather. It's long lasting and resistant to pilling.

Made with baby alpaca wool at 21-23 micron thickness which is lightweight, insulating, less coarse, less prickly, and soft to the touch. Alpacas are not harmed during the shearing process and don't require the use of harsh chemicals during farming. Their soft padded hooves and effective grazing habits reduces the environmental impact making it sustainable
Material: 28% Baby Alpaca, 28% Extrafine Wool, 44% Nylon
Origin: Alpaca sourced from Peru and knitted in Dongguan, China
Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small
Given the nature of the natural alpaca fibers, it is normal to see some shedding
Dry Clean Only

productDetails.productDetails:
• Made with baby alpaca wool at 21-23 micron thickness which is lightweight, insulating, less coarse, less prickly, and soft to the touch. Alpacas are not harmed during the shearing process and don't require the use of harsh chemicals during farming. Their soft padded hooves and effective grazing habits reduces the environmental impact making it sustainable
  • Material: 28% Baby Alpaca, 28% Extrafine Wool, 44% Nylon
  • Origin: Alpaca sourced from Peru and knitted in Dongguan, China
  • Model is 5'9" and wearing a size Small
  • Given the nature of the natural alpaca fibers, it is normal to see some shedding

productDescription.productDescription: Chunky and comfortable at its core, this alpaca turtleneck sweater is made to be loved. Soft and luxurious, the flecked yarn and plush feel make it ideal for harsher weather. It's long lasting and resistant to pilling.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
